website_summaries.verdict: A powerful massage pillow that adds heat and vibration to help loosen tight muscles.
pros: Works well on neck and lower back
cons: Massage may be too intense for some

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! Electrically shocked me on multiple occasions
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this massager as it has great strength and really does work out all the knots in your back. However, after using this several times it has successfully electrically shocked me on 3 separate occasions. I read all of the warnings and instructions before ever using the product. I gave it many chances hoping that it would not shock me again... but no luck. This is worthless now because I am terrified to use it :(
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Item!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this cushion for my bad back issues and I just love it. I can move it all over for relief of shoulder and back pain and it works. The heat feature, which you can choose to use or not, helps to workout the knots. It has helped me a lot and it was a decent price for something this soothing. The cushion is fairly comfortable and it has a nice covering on it. I would recommend this item for back and shoulder relief. For me, it has really helped. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lila

customer_reviews.title: Great for Relieving Spots of Muscle Tension
customer_reviews.text: This massager works well for sore spots in the back and neck. I almost wish it were a full back massager, but if I move it around to the sore spots up and down my spine it does help with muscle tension. The heat is a great addition, but beware that cats think the red lights (that turns on when the heat option is on) are red dot laser toys and may try to attack it! LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Cat LadyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Works great... mostly
customer_reviews.text: Works great. If you are wondering about the underlying concept (can a massager like this really make a difference, they absolutely do). This is the second one of these devices I have bought. The first (from a different manufacturer) actually worked better and was cheaper but it was much worse quality (motor wasn't strong enough). This one would get five stars except for two things: One is that I know it could be better and two, the buttons are poorly placed. The buttons are on the front of the device and can be easily depressed accidentally. Annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: we especially love the combination massage
customer_reviews.text: my husband and i have low back problems on occasion and this sure hit the spot. we especially love the combination massage, heat and vibration setting. if you have never tried a shiatsu, know that the massage knobs are hard and are not gentle. just dont push your back into it and you will be all right. we happen to like the deep massage aspect so it hits the pressure points to relieve.
customer_reviews.author: kit

customer_reviews.title: Danger
customer_reviews.text: I did not get to use this product as it blew up casusing the house power to switch off. I know nothing about power and how it works and just normally plug a unit in and away it goes. The thing is, the website should clearly warn people about using units that are not compatible with that countries power source. I know now due to this incident but there are millions of people out there who are not aware. Please Amazon ... warn people of this danger and state clearly on your website about the dangers and dont wait till someone is injured. Sorry HoMedics i cannot review your product
customer_reviews.author: Phillip W

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN: 3 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on an old item I had that I loved...this one was not up to that standard. Main issue is is BROKE IN 3 MONTHS. Something inside is moving around and it makes noise...rattling, grinding against itself. Whatever the case, it wasn't mistreated and broke quickly. I purchased another item at the same time that is far better than this one and thus far still intact. It is the Gideon product, more maybe but it held together and works far better to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Dehn Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Balls are uncomfortable. Half  rotation is not satisfying.
customer_reviews.text: I am small and balls lined up with my ribs and shoulder blades rather than muscle areas. should be adjustable. I do not like the round balls. they hurt as I notice a lot of people mention. my old Homedic massage pillow was wonderful. it had flat discs that rotated completely around. this one stops half way and goes in other direction. just starts to feel good than stops and changes direction. very unsatisfying motion. I wish that Homedics shatsu would go back to comfortable flat discs and full rotation. I think they would have a lot more totally satisfied customers. it is also hard to hold with no handles.
customer_reviews.author: ccar@metrocast .net

customer_reviews.title: Update, a year lAter"
customer_reviews.text: Update. This is a great machine.if you get very tight muscles in your neck, back, shoulders between shoulders,this will do it. It can be painful if you are severely cramped up. Downside. Heavy. This machine needs sewn in handles across the entire back of the machine to help for back placement. IT is difficult to adjust when you can’t reach behind you to move it. I’d still buy it but get frustrated trying to adjust it across my back. If your muscles are extremely tight, it works but can be painful. That’s because it’s breaking up the tenseness. For serious muscle tightness.
customer_reviews.author: Sisujan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing change
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 4-5 homedics back massagers over the years. This last iteration is a huge disappointment. 1. The mesh material is uncomfortable on bare skin. 2. The range of motion of the massage rollers is less than previous iterations. 3. My back consistently turns the device off by accident. I'd purchase the old models if they were still available.
customer_reviews.author: Anonaholic

customer_reviews.title: PAINFUL
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I can't believe I'm saying this, because I typically love a really strong deep massage and I actually have a homedics handheld percussion massager that's much stronger than this pillow, but for some reason, this thing HURTS. I don't know if it's the particular speed or the spacing of the balls or what, but it's straight up a visit to the Ouch Factory. In addition, the buttons are in the world's stupidest place-- on the front of the pillow, where you lean against!! Which means even when i tried to suffer through the pain, the slightest movement would turn this pillow off. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ashley

customer_reviews.title: They have cheapened the product
customer_reviews.text: I have owned 4 of these over the years. The previous model had 2 rotating heads that were closer in size and so worked together. This new model's heads are different in that one of the heads is much larger than the other. It practically lifts you up off of your seat while the smaller head is too small to be useful. AWKWARD! I often wind up having more back pain than when I started.
customer_reviews.author: AFC in Highlands Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Junk
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this massage device and was satisfied with the appearance and features. I unboxed, plugged in and it vibrated and that was it. No shiatsu, no heat. This is another cheap piece of Chinese engineering that wasted valuable resources and energy to create...only to massively disappoint. Don't waste your money or time.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Tarpley

customer_reviews.title: Good start, bad ending
customer_reviews.text: I like how this thing feels, but it's falling apart and I've not even had it a month. The insides around the moving parts have broken and are loose, it doesn't have it's original shape anymore, and I don't see this working a month from now. I had another brand that lasted 2 years before breaking, I'll probably rebuy it instead
customer_reviews.author: Lawcorp

customer_reviews.title: Three massage vibration options with heat.
customer_reviews.text: I sincerely like this massager. Three massage vibration options. All three can choose a heater. I work in the office with an occupational disease. The neck is often painful. I take 15 minutes to rest before going to bed at night. This massager is very easy to use. Good try!
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower

customer_reviews.title: Got a Dud
customer_reviews.text: This item may have been ok except the one I got was defective. On/off button wouldn't work and the heating button was turning it on/off. The heat didn't work at all, the pillow would change settings by itself while I was trying to use it and then cut off by itself after a few seconds. Thankfully Amazon is awesome when it comes to returns. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Leta H.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The original version was much better. Within 1 day, the vibration stopped and the shiatsu spacing doesn't hit the right spots. Homedics should bring back the original instead of trying to update the looks by sacrificing the mechanics with inferior quality
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sotny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Device
customer_reviews.text: I've taken up running again...and no matter how I stretched out my calves or hamstrings my legs feel tight. I love this machine as it massages my calves perfectly. I tried it on my neck but a little too intense until I put an additional towel over the thing. Not a real fan of the vibration but that's another story. Very well made. Very well worth it. Arrived ahead of time, thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: DBHawaii

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: This is not really a shiatsu pillow. The balls go in the shape of an S, they don't circulate. It ends up pushing the muscles upward only. Maybe, the one that I had was broken. I don't know. It did not seem broken. It seemed poorly designed.. The only place that it feels good is between the shoulder blades. It definitely does not feel good on the neck or lower back.
customer_reviews.author: Innovative

customer_reviews.title: Effective massager for total body.
customer_reviews.text: This massager is great for all parts of the body. I use it for my back, neck, arms, and legs. It feels like two hands giving a deep massage. During cold season, I massage my back in the lung area at first sign of congestion. It seems to break up the congestion.
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA MADISON

customer_reviews.title: works great, vibration is pretty worthless
customer_reviews.text: i have back issues and this really helps get the knots and loosen up the muscles. it is pretty deep and you can control the pressure by putting more weight on it. the vibration is pretty worthless, not sure what that is supposed to do so i never use it. the cord is a decent length so it hopefully won't be too short for you. the quality of the material is good, it should last for a decent amount of time, but it will take a decent amount of friction and abuse, so we'll see. i will update if it wears quickly. overall i am happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this back massager. I had one of those large ones with the seat cushion that you’d place in a chair to use, which was nice, but those large ones are hard to store out of sight but still be readily available to use. This back massager is compact so I can tuck it under the end table out of sight and can pull it out quickly and easily if I want to use it. I can just move it up or down so it can work along my entire back. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for tight muscles and back spasms
customer_reviews.text: This is our second home medics shiatsu and I don’t think we will ever go without one. With just the right angles the heat and vibration will roll some pretty deep knots out of your back. I do miss the pillow flap our older version had to slightly cushion the balls sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not dependable
customer_reviews.text: I have had to return two of these. They work great until they just stop. The one I have now works and then doesn't. I will not buy another. You also have to put something between you and it as it is rough
customer_reviews.author: Lora Steiner

customer_reviews.title: You deserve to feel good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a similar massager in December and decided everyone in my family would get a massager for Christmas. I bought this for my dad and his girlfriend. I selected this one because it is aesthetically pleasing and they have an immaculate home. They also have a lot of stress and this one has a vibrate feature which mine doesn’t and I’m jealous! It’s great and looks nice!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie M.

customer_reviews.title: Really comforting
customer_reviews.text: I have had one for years and my daughter came and used mine. I got this one for her and her husband. They love it. I have arthritis in the back of my neck and it helps me when I can’t take the pain.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brandley

customer_reviews.title: It started glitching after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this for three months and it started acting up on me. It’s as if the buttons have moved or started glitching. I can’t get it to work on a setting I want and it’ll change or turn off on its own. I’m very disappointed with how it hasn't held up especially because I’m now 8 months pregnant and could really use the relief of the massage and heat on my back.
customer_reviews.author: Skylar Coonan

customer_reviews.title: YESSSSSS
customer_reviews.text: This is my biggest lifesaver and one of my favorite purchases I made for myself. After my heating pad crapped out, I debated heavily between just replacing it with another heating pad or with this, and boy am I so glad that I chose this instead. It gets deep into the painful spots of my lower back. It kinda hurts, but that really really good kind of hurt like when you’re getting a deep massage.
customer_reviews.author: CTmama

customer_reviews.title: Homedics massager with heat
customer_reviews.text: I like the massager with heat. I use it for pain in my lower back and it has helped me to be primary pain free for awhile each day. I use it 4 times a day, especially after standing fir a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 2 months with  light use
customer_reviews.text: Deleivred on time and worked fine for around 10 times of 10 mins less use. One day I heard a crack while system is on ( the rotating knob broke I guess). We never manhandle but use was so light but it’s now useless making weird noise and sharp poking. Return window passed else I hands down want refund!!
customer_reviews.author: Fairflair

customer_reviews.title: I use it for everything!
customer_reviews.text: This massager is all that and more! I use it for everything! I’ve used this for my neck/shoulder pain. Upper and lower back pain. My favorite use is for my feet actually. (I put on a fresh pair of socks first.) I have fibromyalgia, so I like that this massager can be used for a variety of aches and pains. Edit: Being able to massage out the tight muscles after dry-needling has been an added benefit also!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kate

customer_reviews.title: Making noises abt to quit working.
customer_reviews.text: I have This product 2 stars. I bought this not long ago and it is already making a loud noise when on vibrate and massage. These pillow massagers tend to not last long and I’m expecting this on to go before long. I have only had one from another Brand last a while. I would not big if you are expecting to use over A month or two.
customer_reviews.author: Rayray

customer_reviews.title: Amazing massage
customer_reviews.text: I had an old model of this for about 10 years and it finally stopped working. This one’s shiatsu massage motion is even better...I’m able to let it sit on my shoulders and move it a few inches every 5-10 minutes to get good massage the whole way down my back. Will probably never use the vibration mode, but love having the heat on during the shiatsu mode.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: The 1 star goes to amazon for making the return and refund so easy.
customer_reviews.text: POS! I took it out of the box, it worked for about 10 minutes, then died. The 1 star goes to amazon for making the return and refund so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Q

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping for more but it’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. It works and feels pretty good but if you’ve got knots to work through this is not the best. You have to move around a lot so it massages other areas. I’m petite and this is not the most comfortable to sit back relax and massage. I wonder if the pricier ones offer more positions.
customer_reviews.author: SE

customer_reviews.title: Helps prevent my daily back pain
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I started having daily back pain and it is really painful at times, but since I've been using this pillow almost every single night, I've had a lot of relief and 85% less pain. I use at night to help relax my back & neck muscles to have a restful sleep. You need to use a light towel or something over it, as the mesh can be a little scratchy, but it's a good idea to do that anyway. I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: SLM

customer_reviews.title: A must have for anyone with neck tension
customer_reviews.text: This is our third homedics shiatsu pillow. We bought our first one probably ten or twelve years ago. My husband wore out the first one, and he's still on his second one. This one was purchased for my daughter who apparently inherited neck muscle tension. It runs for 20 minutes, and it rotates on both sides of your neck, massaging your muscles and relaxing you. You can use it with the heat or without.
customer_reviews.author: Blossom

customer_reviews.title: Quality massage and reliable
customer_reviews.text: We tried 4 massagers altogether thru Amazon, this one was by far the best. Kept having power supply problems with others, this one runs directly on 110 volts so there is no power supply so no electrical problems. The other great feature is the massagers on other ones just go round and round, on this one they go back and forth which feels much more like a real massage.
customer_reviews.author: D. Towle

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Like others said.... It makes A HORRIBLE timing noise that is loud. Someone described it as nails on a chalkboard. They were right. I like that it's soft, and the kneading parts are close together. I'm keeping it because of that alone. Otherwise, this one is a pass.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Soft but its squeaky after a handful of uses
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and it has a nice long cord. I purchased the 1 w a cord rather than the cordless version because I read reviews that the heat was too low on the cordless version. Unfortunately after a handful of uses the messaging rotating balls inside squeak and make a grinding noise. I contacted the seller and received no response.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as my old Brookstone one but not even they make that one any longer. So this appears to be the best currently available. No real complaints. Works as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Steve J

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for use at the office and can be used ...
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for use at the office and can be used from the lower back and moved around up to the neck. The movement and additional vibration plus heat features are incredibly nice when you need to change up the options depending on how bad your back is. It is definitely worth getting this upgrade especially if you have bad back problems. The massagers can dig deep or be gentle depending on how much pressure you put on it. Fits great in all chairs. Not extremely bulky like the full size chair massagers so it great to take to work and utilize as needed. Not extremely loud either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Massager!
customer_reviews.text: Homedics is a trusted brand. The back massager is appealing and easy to use and features heat and vibration. The only thing why i'm not giving it 5 stars is because it only rotates in one direction. It would be even better if this rotates in both directions.
customer_reviews.author: blushers

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for a device. It's not going to be like getting a real massage, but it does what it does pretty well. The cord is somewhat short so you need to keep this in mind when finding a place to use it. It's also difficult to get it in the right spot (which could be different for everyone) but once you do it works well.
customer_reviews.author: jaytalent

customer_reviews.title: All the positive reviews are true.
customer_reviews.text: No need for details from me. This product does exactly what it says. All the positive reviews are true. This item has kept me sane during the pandemic as I await the VA hospital to open back up for the neck surgery I needed back in April.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny F.

customer_reviews.title: Great deep tissue massage or lighter massage
customer_reviews.text: You can apply a lot of pressure and get a much deeper massage (the type of massage that works well but isn't exactly pleasant) with this Shiatsu massager than other types. You can also apply less pressure and make it very relaxing. I've had one of these for many years and put it through a lot. It still works great. The motor amazes me how strong it is.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great product deep tissue !
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing my massage therapist recommended it because I am a hairstylist who always has neck and back pain it is strong so if you are sensitive probably not the best for you
customer_reviews.author: April birchler

customer_reviews.title: Rotatation extremely limited.
customer_reviews.text: Truly dissatisfied. The rotatation is extremely limited. It feels like it can rotate a .25". It feels more like an up and down movement. The arch pitch is too high. I bought this because I previously had a Homemedics back massager. This one just doesn't work the same.
customer_reviews.author: Mmmmmm m

customer_reviews.title: Anxiety/Relaxation/Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have extreme issues with anxiety. And I carry a lot of the stress in my neck, particularly at the base of my skull. This pillow loosens those muscles, which in turn lessens my anxiety. It’s a great product to help you relax and achieve comfort. Especially as you’re trying to get to sleep. It really does the job well. Also, I’ve read the few reviews saying that their pillow stopped working after a month or so, while that may be case for them, mine is still going strong after 3 months. I’m hoping it’ll last for quite a while!
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great massage, heat and vibration.
customer_reviews.text: I used the SP-7 for years. It only had the rotating nodes but it was amazing for pain relief. This model does as good but has the additional features with vibration and Heat. It does an outstanding job relieving pain in my neck, shoulders, back or anywhere else. This was the best $35 I've spent since I bought the last one. Other people complained about it not being battery operated but I think those reviews are idiotic. How about buy a battery operated massager and review that instead of giving this one a bad review based on a irrelevant reason.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Not a long lasting product!
customer_reviews.text: When this product works, it’s great. The vibration and rotary massage is wonderful when it works. For daily use, it’s only productive for 4 days until the product breaks down and stops working. It over heats. The company won’t respond to any calls, voice mails I last, or emails.
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha Doerflein

customer_reviews.title: Hits the spot
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected--warms up quickly, has good rolling action & vibration, takes a little positioning and careful leaning on but you get used to that because it feels so good when it hits the right spot. Worked for some thigh, hip, shoulder, arm massaging--again adjusting position and using light pressure to avoid having the rollers rolling on bone.
customer_reviews.author: Jarkay

customer_reviews.title: Need help with a return of this item.
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to return this item, it works fine but is a little to powerful for me. I have some health issues and need some extra time to return the item as you have indicated return by 2/4/19 and I may not be able to meet that time line and may need to change to a UPS drop off instead of Kohls. I could not find a contact number or email for customer service.Please advise if and how I can make the change or call or email me. Is it ok to extend the return by date. Thanks Harry dbfsinc@aol.com
customer_reviews.author: Harry V. Buyikian

customer_reviews.title: Economical massage solution
customer_reviews.text: Just got this. No idea how long it lasts for but after two days of using it I'm very happy! I lift and strain myself at times, this helped alleviate some neck and shoulder pain. :)
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: Reduces Pain
customer_reviews.text: I think I’m going to marry this! It’s a wonderful massage. Wish it got hotter. Also it could use a handle or Hook and loop strap to grab or attach to a chair. If it got hotter I would give it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: LGreenwell

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey... But
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This bad boy is amazing. The heat setting is unbelievable and the kneading massagers can take some pressure. I use this on my back in a recliner & it didn't even stutter when leaning/pressing back into the massage pad. I'd definitely recommend! 💯
customer_reviews.author: BlackBetty

customer_reviews.title: What's a relaxing way to end the day
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my mother. I knew that she would enjoy it but to my surprise I tried it out and I enjoyed it too. I like the settings on the massager and they are not too rough. as to feel like I am being massaged, by a heavy handed person.I really enjoyed this😁😁
customer_reviews.author: EEBEE

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend due to mesh cover
customer_reviews.text: The mesh covering is painful. Even after putting a towel to cover it and use it while wearing a t-shirt, the mesh managed to cut my skin and cause bleeding. Do not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Big E

customer_reviews.title: This HOMEDICS shiatsu unit works great!
customer_reviews.text: This product works! It kneads the knots of my upper back, upper shoulders and neck. Feels good and has also helped me in preventing a full blown headache. Great price and product warranty. It’s a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Forest1983

customer_reviews.title: Great features for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift but I got to try it out. It works well. This was one of very few models (especially at this price) that does BOTH massaging and vibration (even both at the same time if you want it!) Don't fall for the no-name bands, this is a brand that you can trust.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: I set it up in a comfortable chair and I use it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I set it up in a comfortable chair and I use it a lot. It does the job for a good price, it's portable. My son who has a big massage chair, tried it and was impressed with the way it massages the upper back. It can be moved to any area you need, including the neck area. I would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Frenchie

customer_reviews.title: Life saver.
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at how heavy duty this thing is. I use it in the recliner and I'm able to recline more than you would think, because it puts weight directly on the unit. It just keeps massaging away. I don't use the heat often, but it works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Techno geek

customer_reviews.title: Nice heating function, gentle massage
customer_reviews.text: The massager has a pretty nice heating function built in, but offers an average machined massage at best. While I enjoy using mine from time to time, it definitely is beat by other alternatives on the market.
customer_reviews.author: John Parker

customer_reviews.title: Good massage pillow
customer_reviews.text: I used to own the much older product and updated to this one. The vibration is a nice added touch. Easy to use and it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: katrin  s

customer_reviews.title: Like the other version better
customer_reviews.text: I have this one myself. Bought this particular one as a gift. It’s a tiny bit different. It doesn’t have a protective cover to make the rollers feel less aggressive, hence only 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a month and a half of use
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied. This used to be a quality brand but this product is cheaply made junk. It broke after a month and a half of use.
customer_reviews.author: D. Meister

customer_reviews.title: Eases back pain
customer_reviews.text: I love the hear and massage but the hard shiatsu balls for deep massage can be uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: D.Brown

customer_reviews.title: It hurts! And you cannot return it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he did not like it. He said that it was really painful and did not provide him relief at all. - just more pain. There weren't settings to decrease the pressure. The company does not allow you to return it either, which I was not aware.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: For someone whose back hurts a lot, this is a game changer and way cheaper than getting frequent massages. Note for those who like a lighter touch- probably not for you. There's no way to change the intensity of the massage and it might be too much for some people.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina G

customer_reviews.title: Kept overheating! Returned!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hurts like h*ll! Returned because it hurt and kept overheating!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Poole-Bennett

customer_reviews.title: BROKE
customer_reviews.text: PURCHASED JAN 2018. LIGHT USAGE. MAKES EXTRA LOUD NOISE SEPT 2018. IT'S LIKE THE BALLS ARE HITTING SOMETHING IN THE MIDDLE IN SHIATSU VIBRATING MODE. 9/15/18 Contacted manufacturer and they sent a replacement since it was still under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: G. Choi

customer_reviews.title: Nice massage for lower back
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice massage for your lower back. Its not gentle but really helps muscle soreness. Heat works well too.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: I like it enough that I bought one for my mom after using my boyfriend’s. A bit awkward but if you push into the rollers it seems to help a lot. Button is annoyingly placed because it’s easy to accidentally turn off.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki Mac

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I like the prior model and material better than this new version, but it's still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: It’s great but
customer_reviews.text: I use this and it helps but I’m a little too small for it and therefore have to bae careful positioning it or it can hurt Works better better for my husband. Still I’m glad I have it
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Skahan

customer_reviews.title: Very good, solidly built unit
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built, works very well. Only drawback is that the massage balls inside the unit could be a little softer. They are so hard it can actually hurt if you put the full weight of you head/neck on the unit. It's also a little bulky/ heavy and would not be easy to travel with. It does a good job of relieving stressed neck muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Deuce

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable to use.
customer_reviews.text: aThe structure of this unit was so hard and uncomfortable to use that we were unable to make it work. The heat and vibration were as advertised, it's just the shape and bulk of it made it too awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Had to return it.
customer_reviews.text: It diesn't press very hard and it broke the first day I had it.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: 3-D version AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had an old original Homedics shiatsu massager that I had for about 20 years. Best thing ever. It finally broke down. I went to buy another one from a local store. I bought one there but ended up returning it because it wasn't the same. Then searching on Amazon I found the 3D version....I ordered it and WOW this one is awesome!!! I love it and use it everyday. If this one lasts as long as my first one.....it's great value for an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: capturedit

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Feels like one of the chairs at the mall. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Stacyrose

customer_reviews.title: This one works great with the feel of a real massage rather than ...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned at least 20 massagers that were all short-lived. This one works great with the feel of a real massage rather than just vibrating. A must buy for people with back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Cole

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Strong and powerful massager. It doesn’t get very hot but overall great value for price.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Not really crazy about this purchase...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this massager, but it's just way too uncomfortable for my neck. I can tolerate strong massages- but this just didn't do it for me. Unfortunately, all of the neck massagers work the same way with four round rotating balls that roll around. It's just too much and made me even more sore. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love this massager! It has 3 different options and a separate heat option. Have used for 3 months with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had kept it!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a grab bag. I haven’t used it myself so can’t speak to performance but it was as I expected. Seems like it was good quality
customer_reviews.author: Donna Graham

customer_reviews.title: love this massager
customer_reviews.text: love this massager...it is really great. I lay my back against it when I'm hurting and it just relaxes me so and makes my aching back feel so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Very rough
customer_reviews.text: This product is so hard, very uncomfortable . Returned it
customer_reviews.author: Carole Appleby

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this massager is worth it. The combination of heat, vibration and massage does the trick for mild to moderate issues.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for deep tissue and more localized massage
customer_reviews.text: Great for spot treating of your muscles. If you're looking for an entire back massager this isn't for you. I also like deep tissue massages so if you're more sensitive, you may not like it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Trump

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This Homedics massage pillow is great for sore neck and shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate to buy this
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little massager. I am enjoying it so much. Has kneading, vibrating and heat settings. You can move it around from chair to chair so that is a real plus. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not worth it spend a little extra for one that vibrates.
customer_reviews.text: it broke within having it a month and it doesn't even vibrate.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Jade

customer_reviews.title: Turns off frequently
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. Power button is located where shoulder blade meets pad. Shuts off the second you lay on it. Otherwise its a faulty motor. Either way it is a terrible design and I can't even use it.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: CANNOT say ENOUGH good THINGS about this product
customer_reviews.text: CANNOT say ENOUGH good THINGS about this product. I use it on my lower back, upper back. Pretty much anywhere that needs a massage. It is made well and seems sturdy. It is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Nauman

customer_reviews.title: Zipper frays the cord
customer_reviews.text: The zipper vibrates against the cord and frays the cord. I bought this April 20th and June 3rd the shiatsu balls stopped working due to damage to the cord from the zipper rubbing against it. It was great until it broke!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Long

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly portable with a powerful punch.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a steal. I love it. I told my spouse not to get jealous. The heat works well. The size is perfectly portable and it packs a good punch. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it, this is my second.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered another type of massager for shoulders that ended up breaking after a month. I had one of these homedics many years ago and remember it working well. This new one is excellent. I just wish it had straps like the shoulder massagers do to increase control and pressure.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works incredibly well! It’s very strong and the heat is wonderful. Well Worth the price. 👍
customer_reviews.author: NW Pagan

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Physical Therapy
customer_reviews.text: Bought previously excellent for pain didn't get the second one but I got a refund
customer_reviews.author: Marie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Big win for picky back pain sufferer
customer_reviews.text: My handyman husband rarely likes things he didn’t pick out for himself. He has a bulging L4-L5 and LOVES this thing. He uses it every single morning while drinking coffee and reading — usually with the heat function on — and he always pouts when the timer goes off. A good buy for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Chiquitanita

product_meta.title: Homedics 3D Shiatsu & Vibration Massage Pillow with Heat
product_meta.description:
Since our beginnings in 1987, HoMedics has created, innovated and refined a remarkable line of personal wellness products to become the recognized #1 Brand in Massage. The 3D Shiatsu and Vibration Massage Pillow with Heat combines our advancements in the field of massage with modern, portable technology to create a rewarding, satisfying massage solution.

The HoMedics 3D Shiatsu and Vibration Massage Pillow with Heat provides an invigorating shiatsu and vibration massage to target soreness in your back. Get a professional-feeing massage to reduce chronic pain in your lower lumbar, center back, shoulders, or neck – wherever you feel the most tension. The pillow delivers a circular kneading massage that moves in an inward and outward motion for a deeper, more authentic massage experience.

The vibration and heat features help to stimulate blood flow to sore muscles and joints – promoting pain relief and relaxation. Use the heat and vibration mechanisms with the Shiatsu for the ultimate massage, or choose a single feature to best suit your massage needs. The vibration feature helps to penetrate deep in your body, stimulating your inner tissues and organs to relax your entire body. The heat feature helps to sooth and relaxes your muscles. Both features help to increase blood flow to target areas, which promotes healing wherever you use it.

Stop spending money on massage cushions that waste batteries! This HoMedics Shiatsu and Vibration Massage Pillow with Heat comes with a 6ft, 120v adapter. The extra-long cord allows for greater mobility. Get a great massage in virtually any chair you choose
feature_bullets: 3D SHIATSU MASSAGE: Enjoy a deep kneading shiatsu massage as the nodes move in and out for an authentic massage feel. Intended to be strong massage, you can personalize your experience and provide as much pressure as you feel comfortable to the desired area
VIBRATING HEAT: The addition of soothing heat and invigorating vibration add to the already relaxing experience. Both features can be used individually or in conjunction to your massage
INTEGRATED CONTROLS: No need to fuss with remotes and interrupt your massage. The simple to use integrated controls can easily be accessed on the left side of the massager

COMPACT AND PORTABLE: Made to fit standard chairs with lightweight portability, enjoy a massage at home or on the go. Compatible with standard US outlets, you can travel relaxing relief with you for home, to the office and more
WHAT’S IN THE BOX: (1) HoMedics 3D Shiatsu & Vibration Massage Pillow with Heat

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
